passive.name: ArmourUp
passive.description: This increases the Armour of the assigned character

passive.name: BULLETDAMAGEUP
passive.description: This slightly increases the amount of damage the character does with their gun.

passive.name: Reticule
passive.description: This increases the unit's range when aiming their weapon.

passive.name: SpeedUp
passive.description: This increases the unit's movement Range with their new shiny boots.

passive.name: Tracker
passive.description: This item tracks the enemies locations before and while in combat, giving the user a unique Speed advantage.

passive.name: MPPPD
passive.description: One of the most powerful magnetically propelled weapons in the galaxy. Has a significant Damage increase but is quite heavy and takes long to operate.
